GK22vidsriiu:1: akalitanijapararūpaḥ svakam api doṣaṃ parasthitaṃ vetti VidSrk_38.30a
GK22vidsriiu:3: akasmād unmatta praharasi kim adhvakṣitiruhaṃ VidSrk_33.54a *(1072a)
GK22vidsriiu:5: akārye tathyo vā bhavati vitathaḥ kāmam athavā VidSrk_40.6a *(1338a)
GK22vidsriiu:6: akṛtapremaiva varaṃ na punaḥ saṃjātavighaṭitapremā VidSrk_23.54a *(805a)
GK22vidsriiu:7: akrīḍan nimiṣaṃ sa naiti phalinaṃ yat tvāṃ vikāśaikamut VidSrk_33.85c

GK22vidsriiu:10: akṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kim aghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyor vapuḥ VidSrk_29.4b *(900b)

GK22vidsriiu:15: agamyo mantrāṇāṃ prakṛtibhiṣajām apy aviṣayaḥ VidSrk_38.17a *(1270a)
GK22vidsriiu:17: agre gacchata dhenudagdhakalaśān ādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ VidSrk_6.36a *(139a)

GK22vidsriiu:27: aṅgaṃ vihvalayan mano vikalayan mānaṃ samunmūlayan VidSrk_34.9c *(1133c)
GK22vidsriiu:28: aṅgākṛṣṭadukūlayā sarabhasaṃ gūḍhau bhujābhyāṃ stanāv VidSrk_19.12a
GK22vidsriiu:32: aṅge ca pratibhāti mārdavam idaṃ snigdhasvabhāvaś ciraṃ VidSrk_17.29c

GK22vidsriiu:42: ajñātopanatena tena sahasā mūrdhnaiva sambhāvitaḥ VidSrk_21.59d *(693d)
GK22vidsriiu:45: aṇur api nanu naiva kroḍabhūṣāsya kācit VidSrk_33.61a *(1079a)
GK22vidsriiu:48: ataruvārir ataḥ param asamaśilādurgamo mārgaḥ VidSrk_24.5b *(811b)

GK22vidsriiu:52: ataḥ śaṃkara evāsi sadā skandaḥ paraṃ na te VidSrk_41.52b *(1432b)
GK22vidsriiu:53: ataḥ saṃyoge 'smin paravati viyoge ca sahaje VidSrk_48.42c *(1635c)
GK22vidsriiu:54: atikrāntaṃ tais taiḥ kavibhir abhinandādibhir api VidSrk_42.40b *(1500b)
GK22vidsriiu:59: atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ VidSrk_38.1a
GK22vidsriiu:63: atyaccho 'yam adhaś ca paṅkam akhilaṃ chāyāpadeśād abhūt VidSrk_29.17b
GK22vidsriiu:64: atyantaṃ karisūkarāhigavayair bhīmaṃ puraḥ kānanam VidSrk_24.4b *(810b)
GK22vidsriiu:65: atyantābhimate 'pi vastuni vidhir yāsāṃ niṣedhātmakaṃ VidSrk_16.1c *(384c)

GK22vidsriiu:67: atyuccaiḥ padam icchatā punar iyaṃ no laṅghanīyā tvayā VidSrk_33.105b
GK22vidsriiu:70: atyunmāthini candane 'pi niyataṃ nāmāgnir uttiṣṭhati VidSrk_21.31d *(665d)
GK22vidsriiu:71: atrāsthaḥ piśitaṃ śavasya kaṭhinair utkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ nakhair VidSrk_44.8a
GK22vidsriiu:72: atraiṣa svayam eva citraphalake kampaskhalallekhayā VidSrk_18.15a *(549a)
GK22vidsriiu:73: atha ca savituḥ śītollāsaṃ lunanti marīcayo VidSrk_8.13c *(164c)
GK22vidsriiu:74: atha ca hṛdaye mānagranthiḥ svayaṃ śithilāyate VidSrk_8.8d *(159d)
GK22vidsriiu:79: adya śvo vā sarid akaruṇā tvāṃ śriyā pātayitrī VidSrk_33.59d *(1077d)
GK22vidsriiu:80: adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇagṛhiṇī tatraiva yat kunthati VidSrk_39.7d *(1310d)
GK22vidsriiu:82: adya svargavadhūgaṇe guṇamaya tvatkīrtim indūjvalām VidSrk_32.13a *(1007a)
GK22vidsriiu:83: adya svāṃ jananīm akāraṇaruṣā prātaḥ sudūraṃ gatāṃ VidSrk_24.22a *(828a)

GK22vidsriiu:99: adharam indukarād api śubhrayanty aruṇayanty aruṇād api kiṃ dṛśam
GK22vidsriiu:109: adhīte bhikṣābhug bhuvam adhiśayānaś cirataram VidSrk_42.18b *(1478b)
GK22vidsriiu:112: adho 'dho gaṅgāvad vayam upagatā dūram athavā VidSrk_40.21c *(1353c)
GK22vidsriiu:113: adhyetṝṇāṃ dadhānaṃ bhṛśam alasadṛśāṃ kiṃcid aṅgāvasādaṃ VidSrk_31.6c

GK22vidsriiu:136: anucitam idam akramaś ca puṃsāṃ VidSrk_43.2a *(1519a)

GK22vidsriiu:143: anena kila nirjitā vayam iti priyāyāḥ karaṃ VidSrk_14.1c *(323c)

GK22vidsriiu:188: anyonyapratikūlam īśaśivayoḥ pāṇigrahe pātu vaḥ VidSrk_5.29d *(99d)

GK22vidsriiu:201: apatyāni prāyo daśa daśa varāhī janayati VidSrk_36.14a *(1206a)
GK22vidsriiu:202: apanaya mahāmohaṃ rājann anena tavāsinā VidSrk_32.21a *(1015a)

GK22vidsriiu:265: amṛtam adhare tiryagbhūte viṣaṃ ca vilocane VidSrk_16.18d *(401d)

GK22vidsriiu:287: ayam ayamayaṃ kiṃ ca klāmyaty asaṃsmaraṇena te VidSrk_22.32c *(731c)

GK22vidsriiu:297: ayaṃ dhārāvāhas taḍid iyam iyaṃ dagdhakarakā VidSrk_22.9a *(708a)

GK22vidsriiu:972: etāṃ mlānim upāgatāṃ srajam iva tyaktvā tanuṃ durvahām VidSrk_22.28c
GK22vidsriiu:976: etāḥ śoṇitapaṅkakuṅkumakuṣaḥ sambhūya kāntaiḥ pibanty VidSrk_44.5c
GK22vidsriiu:977: etāḥ saṃnidhimātrakalpitapuraskārās tu dhanyās tvaco VidSrk_33.81c
GK22vidsriiu:979: ete kiṃśukaśākhino 'pi malinair aṅgāritāḥ kuḍmalaiḥ VidSrk_23.8c *(759c)
GK22vidsriiu:980: ete kuñcitajānavo navajale nirvānti gharmāhatā VidSrk_10.24c *(238c)
GK22vidsriiu:981: ete 'kṣṇor janayanti kāmavirujaṃ sītāviyoge ghanā VidSrk_47.10a *(1586a)
GK22vidsriiu:983: ete cūtamahīruho 'py aviralair dhūmāyitāḥ ṣaṭpadair VidSrk_23.8a *(759a)
GK22vidsriiu:988: etenaiva durātmanā jalanidher utthāpya pāpām imāṃ VidSrk_47.4c *(1580c)
GK22vidsriiu:993: ete lakṣmaṇa jānakīvirahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā VidSrk_6.28a *(131a)
GK22vidsriiu:994: eteṣām api paśya kiṃśukataroḥ patrair abhinnatviṣāṃ VidSrk_8.6c *(157c)
GK22vidsriiu:997: ete snigdhatamā iti mā mā kṣudreṣu kuruta viśvāsam VidSrk_38.43a *(1296a)
GK22vidsriiu:998: enāṃ varṇayitā smaro yadi sa ced vaidarbhyam abhyasyati VidSrk_16.36d
GK22vidsriiu:999: ebhir bhāti gabhastitantupaṭalaiḥ śvetorṇanābhaḥ śaśī VidSrk_29.60d
GK22vidsriiu:1000: evaṃ kartum ahaṃ samartha iti ced dhiṅ mūrkha kiṃ sarvato VidSrk_33.42c
GK22vidsriiu:1002: evaṃsādanam utsaheta sa jagaj jetuṃ kathaṃ manmathaṃ VidSrk_16.20c *(403c)
GK22vidsriiu:1003: evaṃ sthāpaya subhru bāhulatikām evaṃ kuru sthānakaṃ VidSrk_4.31a *(60a)
GK22vidsriiu:1004: eṣa tvāṃ kalitaḥ kalābhir udayaty agre śaśī pārvaṇaḥ VidSrk_33.84d
GK22vidsriiu:1010: eṣāhaṃ sukhinī bhavāmi na sahe tīvrāṃ viyogavyathām VidSrk_22.28d *(727d)
GK22vidsriiu:1011: eṣo 'haṃ muditālikokilakulaṃ kurvan vanaṃ prāptavān VidSrk_8.19c *(170c)
GK22vidsriiu:1014: aiśānam iva kapālaṃ sphuṭalakṣma sphurati śaśibimbam VidSrk_29.54b *(950b)
GK22vidsriiu:1018: ka iva hi guṇo yo 'smān kuryān nareśvaravallabhān VidSrk_42.10d *(1470d)
GK22vidsriiu:1019: ka ekas tvaṃ puṣpāyudha mama samādhivyayavidhau VidSrk_1.15a *(16a)
GK22vidsriiu:1020: ka ete sambandhān malayamarutaś cūtataravo VidSrk_40.13c *(1345c)
GK22vidsriiu:1024: kakubhi kakubhi bhrāntvā bhrāntvā vilokya vilokitaṃ VidSrk_33.64a *(1082a)
GK22vidsriiu:1031: kaṭākṣebhyo bibhyan nibhṛtam iva candro 'bhyudayate VidSrk_29.13d *(909d)
GK22vidsriiu:1037: kaṇṭhadhvānajuṣo haranti hṛdayaṃ madhyevanaṃ kokilāḥ VidSrk_8.20b *(171b)
GK22vidsriiu:1038: kaṇṭhān bibhrati viṣkirāḥ śaraśamīnīḍeṣu nāḍiṃdhamān VidSrk_9.14d *(204d)
GK22vidsriiu:1040: kaṇṭhe mauktikamālikāḥ stanataṭe kārpūram acchaṃ rajaḥ VidSrk_16.2a
GK22vidsriiu:1041: kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ sukaṇṭhaḥ punar api kucayor dattagāḍhāṅgasaṅgaḥ
GK22vidsriiu:1043: katipayadivasasthāyī pūro dūronnato 'pi bhavitā te VidSrk_33.92a *(1110a)
GK22vidsriiu:1044: katipayam api tvatto 'smābhiḥ samudra samīhitam VidSrk_33.63b *(1081b)
GK22vidsriiu:1045: katham ato na viṣīdatu paṇḍitaḥ VidSrk_42.32d *(1492d)
GK22vidsriiu:1046: katham anyatheśvarāṇāṃ viluṭhati hṛdaye ca maulau ca VidSrk_33.101b
GK22vidsriiu:1047: katham api yadi dṛṣṭaṃ vārivāhaṃ vihāya VidSrk_33.36b *(1054b)
GK22vidsriiu:1048: katham api haṭhād ākṛṣyānte paṭasya niveśitām VidSrk_15.33b *(366b)
GK22vidsriiu:1049: katham api hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām VidSrk_21.60d *(694d)
GK22vidsriiu:1050: katham asi na māṃdhātā deva trilokavijayy api VidSrk_41.37d *(1417d)
GK22vidsriiu:1052: katham iva tava bhṛṣṭo rājakīraḥ karotu VidSrk_33.102b *(1120b)
GK22vidsriiu:1053: kathaya kuhakakrīḍāścaryaṃ kathaṃ kva ca śikṣitam VidSrk_32.21b *(1015b)
GK22vidsriiu:1056: kathaya murale kenāmī te kṛtā niculadrumāḥ VidSrk_24.3d *(809d)
GK22vidsriiu:1057: kathaya sukṛtī ko 'sau mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate VidSrk_17.44d *(508d)
GK22vidsriiu:1060: kathaṃcin nīyante ratiramaṇabāṇair api hataiḥ VidSrk_23.29b *(780b)
GK22vidsriiu:1061: kathaṃcin naidāghe divasa iva kope vigalite VidSrk_21.40a *(674a)
GK22vidsriiu:1062: kathaṃcil labdhāni pravitarati toyāni jagate VidSrk_40.47c *(1379c)
GK22vidsriiu:1063: kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ VidSrk_50.28d *(1725d)
GK22vidsriiu:1064: kathaṃ svapnaḥ sākṣāt kuvalayadṛśaṃ kalpayatu tām VidSrk_17.64d *(528d)
GK22vidsriiu:1065: kathāpi śrotavyā bhavati hataketor na ca punar VidSrk_33.13c *(1031c)
GK22vidsriiu:1066: kathābhir deśānāṃ katham api ca kālena bahunā VidSrk_49.5a *(1642a)
GK22vidsriiu:1068: kadā tad draṣṭavyaṃ vadanam avadātaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ VidSrk_23.30d *(781d)
GK22vidsriiu:1069: kadā nu drakṣyāmo vigalitadukūlaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ VidSrk_23.7d *(758d)
GK22vidsriiu:1070: kadaitat sampūrṇaṃ mama hṛdayavṛtter abhimataṃ VidSrk_48.31c *(1624c)
GK22vidsriiu:1075: kandarpād api sundarākṛtir iti prauḍhotsaladrāgayā VidSrk_1.13a *(14a)
GK22vidsriiu:1077: kandaṃ nāgādhirājo viyad ativipulaḥ patrakośāvakāśaḥ VidSrk_6.43b *(146b)
GK22vidsriiu:1080: kapāle gambhīraḥ kuhariṇi jaṭāsaṃdhiṣu kṛśaḥ VidSrk_4.24a *(53a)
GK22vidsriiu:1082: kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karāṃl leḍhi śaśinas VidSrk_29.9a *(905a)
GK22vidsriiu:1087: kapolaṃ pakṣmabhyaḥ kalayati kapolāt kucataṭaṃ VidSrk_21.49a *(683a)

GK22vidsriiu:1092: kapolebhyo baddhaḥ katham akhilaviśvaprabhur asāv VidSrk_42.36a *(1496a)
GK22vidsriiu:1095: kamalam iti gṛhītaṃ haṃsam āśu tyajantyāḥ VidSrk_17.7b *(471b)

GK22vidsriiu:1098: kampante kapayo bhṛśaṃ jaḍakṛśaṃ go 'jāvikaṃ glāyati VidSrk_13.8a *(313a)
GK22vidsriiu:1099: kampī pāyād apāyāj jvalitaśikhiśikhe cakṣuṣi nyastahastaḥ VidSrk_5.21d
GK22vidsriiu:1100: kambor viḍambanakaraś ca sa eva kaṇṭhaḥ VidSrk_17.63c *(527c)
GK22vidsriiu:1103: karakisalayaṃ dhūtvā dhūtvā vimārgati vāsasī VidSrk_19.33a *(591a)
GK22vidsriiu:1108: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvam adharaṃ VidSrk_17.51c *(515c)
GK22vidsriiu:1112: karuṇādravam eva durjanaḥ sutarāṃ satpuruṣaṃ prabādhate VidSrk_38.23a
GK22vidsriiu:1113: kareṇa paritāḍayañ jayati jātahāsaḥ smaraḥ VidSrk_14.1d *(323d)
GK22vidsriiu:1114: kare ślāghyas tyāgaḥ śirasi gurupādapraṇayitā VidSrk_37.31a *(1243a)
GK22vidsriiu:1116: karoti maitrīm atha dūṣitā guṇāḥ VidSrk_49.37b *(1674b)
GK22vidsriiu:1121: karṇānte ca parāpakāracaturo nyasto dvijihvādhipaḥ VidSrk_40.35b *(1367b)

GK22vidsriiu:1126: karṇe yan na kṛtaṃ sakhījanavaco yan nādṛtā bandhuvāg VidSrk_22.3a *(702a)
GK22vidsriiu:1129: kartuṃ na śaktaḥ sadṛśaṃ priyāyāḥ VidSrk_16.75b *(458b)
GK22vidsriiu:1130: kartuṃ nātha varūthinīyam avanīṃ jetuṃ punas tvadbhujau VidSrk_41.46d
GK22vidsriiu:1134: karpūradravaśīkarair iva diśo limpanti pampānilāḥ VidSrk_34.1d *(1125d)
GK22vidsriiu:1136: karpūraiḥ kim apūri kiṃ malayajair ālepi kiṃ pāradair VidSrk_29.4a *(900a)
GK22vidsriiu:1138: karṣaty eṣa kareṇa keśarasaṭābhāraṃ jaratkuñjaraḥ VidSrk_33.16d *(1034d)
GK22vidsriiu:1140: karṣantyā mama tāvad aṅgalikhanair evāpadeṣāgatā VidSrk_24.12d *(818d)
GK22vidsriiu:1144: kalaṅko ratnaṃ tu pratiphaṇam anarghaṃ viṣabhṛtām VidSrk_42.36d *(1496d)
GK22vidsriiu:1145: kalaṅgas tatratyo yadi ca vikacendīvaravanam VidSrk_23.21b *(772b)
GK22vidsriiu:1146: kalamalotkalitaṃ tu na me manaḥ sakhi babhūva vṛthaiva yathaiṣamaḥ
GK22vidsriiu:1152: kalāśeṣā mūrtiḥ śaśina iva netrotsavakarī VidSrk_22.17b *(716b)
GK22vidsriiu:1155: kaliḥ kvāyaṃ pāpaḥ kva ca guṇanidher janma bhavato VidSrk_42.45c *(1505c)
GK22vidsriiu:1158: kalpāntārabhaṭīnaṭasya bhavatāt tad vaḥ śriye tāṇḍavam VidSrk_4.4d *(33d)
GK22vidsriiu:1161: kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kim adhikam ito jīvanārthaṃ yad asmāl VidSrk_33.21a *(1039a)

GK22vidsriiu:1164: kalyāṇaṃ vo diśatu sa munigrāmaṇīr arkabandhuḥ VidSrk_1.3d *(4d)
GK22vidsriiu:1165: kalyāṇī te matur ubhayato vismayaṃ nas tanoti VidSrk_50.26b *(1723b)
GK22vidsriiu:1168: kallolāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ punar amī nītāḥ parām unnatim VidSrk_33.10b

GK22vidsriiu:1181: kaṣṭaṃ durgatikasya jīvitam aho dārair api tyajyate VidSrk_40.18d *(1350d)
GK22vidsriiu:1182: kaṣṭaṃ yat khalu dīrghayā dhanatṛṣā nīco janaḥ sevitaḥ VidSrk_42.55d
GK22vidsriiu:1183: kaṣṭaṃ viśramayāmi kutra nayane sarvatra vāmo vidhiḥ VidSrk_23.8d *(759d)
GK22vidsriiu:1184: kastūrībhiḥ kim iha likhito drāviḍaḥ patrabhaṅgaḥ VidSrk_16.24b *(407b)
GK22vidsriiu:1186: kasmāt tvaṃ tātagehād aparam abhinavā brūhi kā tatra vārtā VidSrk_5.28a
GK22vidsriiu:1187: kasmāt pārvati niṣṭhurāsi sahajaḥ śailodbhavānām ayaṃ VidSrk_4.6a *(35a)
GK22vidsriiu:1188: kasmād idaṃ nayanam astamitāñ janaśri VidSrk_22.23a *(722a)
GK22vidsriiu:1190: kasmād vepitam etad induvadane bhogīndrabhīter bhava VidSrk_5.5b *(75b)

GK22vidsriiu:1197: kasyā nāma kim atra nāsti viditaṃ yad vīkṣyamāṇo 'py ayaṃ VidSrk_49.45a
GK22vidsriiu:1201: kasrāghātaiḥ surabhir abhitaḥ satvaraṃ tāḍanīyo VidSrk_23.6a *(757a)
GK22vidsriiu:1203: kaṃcit kālaṃ kvacid api ratis tena kas te 'parādhaḥ VidSrk_21.9b *(643b)
GK22vidsriiu:1204: kaṃcit kālaṃ naṭati nikaṭe khañjarīṭaḥ priyāyāḥ VidSrk_11.9d *(274d)
GK22vidsriiu:1205: kaṃ deśam āśrayatu yūthapatir mṛgāṇām VidSrk_33.22d *(1040d)
GK22vidsriiu:1207: kaḥ kopāvasaraḥ prasīda rahasi svedāmbhasāṃ bindavo VidSrk_21.26c *(660c)
GK22vidsriiu:1210: kākāḥ samprati ghoṣayanti sabhayāḥ kāketi nāmnātmanaḥ VidSrk_30.11d

GK22vidsriiu:1213: kācid vadhūr virahiṇīva śarad vibhāti VidSrk_11.12d *(277d)
GK22vidsriiu:1215: kā tvaṃ kuntalamallakīrtir ahaha kvāsi sthitā na kvacit VidSrk_32.11a
GK22vidsriiu:1219: kāntaṃ karṇāv abhiniviśate komalāgraṃ śirīṣaṃ VidSrk_9.19c *(209c)
GK22vidsriiu:1220: kāntaḥ prasthitikalpitopakaraṇaḥ sakhyā bhṛśaṃ vāritaḥ VidSrk_17.69d
GK22vidsriiu:1223: kāntāpādatalāhatis tava mude satyaṃ mamāpy āvayoḥ VidSrk_23.19c *(770c)
GK22vidsriiu:1226: kāntāṃ kvāpi vilambinīṃ kalarutair āhūya bhūyas tato VidSrk_10.8a *(222a)
GK22vidsriiu:1228: kāntir maṇḍalam aindavaṃ mama punar nādyāpi viśrāmabhūḥ VidSrk_32.11d
GK22vidsriiu:1229: kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād VidSrk_19.14a *(572a)
GK22vidsriiu:1230: kāntena prahito navaḥ priyasakhīvargeṇa baddhaspṛhaś VidSrk_8.4a *(155a)
GK22vidsriiu:1231: kāntenāśu mudhā vilokitam atho tanvyā mudhā lajjitaṃ VidSrk_19.1c *(559c)
GK22vidsriiu:1232: kāpotaṃ kodravāṇāṃ kavalayati kaṇān kṣetrakoṇaikadeśe VidSrk_10.50d
GK22vidsriiu:1233: kāpy anyā mukulādhikāramilitā lakṣmīr aśokadrume VidSrk_8.24a *(175a)
GK22vidsriiu:1234: kāpy anyā hariṇīdṛśaḥ pariṇatiḥ kandarpamudrāṅkitā VidSrk_15.50d *(383d)
GK22vidsriiu:1235: kāmakrodhau dvayam api padaṃ pratyanīkaṃ vaśitve VidSrk_1.3a *(4a)
GK22vidsriiu:1238: kāmaṃ kukkuṭayor dvayaṃ drutapadakrūrakramaṃ yudhyati VidSrk_35.24d

GK22vidsriiu:1241: kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇās tṛṇena jīvanty ayatnasulabhena VidSrk_42.34a *(1494a)

GK22vidsriiu:1243: kāmaḥ puṣpaśaraḥ kileti sumanovargaṃ lunīte ca yat VidSrk_18.7c *(541c)
GK22vidsriiu:1244: kāmājñayā priyatamām iva nīyate sma VidSrk_10.28d *(242d)
GK22vidsriiu:1247: kāminyā smaravedanākuladṛśā yaḥ kelikāle kṛtaḥ VidSrk_20.13c *(624c)

GK22vidsriiu:1257: kāreṇa sphuṭam eva tat pariṇataṃ kvedaṃ vadāmo 'dbhutam VidSrk_16.5d
GK22vidsriiu:1259: kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcam ālambate VidSrk_21.61c *(695c)
GK22vidsriiu:1262: kālaḥ kalir jagad idaṃ na kṛtajñam ajñe VidSrk_49.32c *(1669c)

GK22vidsriiu:2378: tamo 'pi vyālolaṃ vigalati tadīyaṃ nivasanam VidSrk_29.42d *(938d)

GK22vidsriiu:2381: tayā dṛṣṭiṃ dattvā mahati maṇidīpe nipuṇayā VidSrk_19.21c *(579c)
GK22vidsriiu:2383: taraṅgaya dṛśo 'ṅgane patatu citram indīvaraṃ VidSrk_17.54a *(518a)
GK22vidsriiu:2384: tarattāraṃ tāvat prathamam atha citrārpitam iva VidSrk_17.3a *(467a)
GK22vidsriiu:2386: taranto dṛśyante bahava iha gambhīrasarasi VidSrk_49.60a *(1697a)
GK22vidsriiu:2390: tarucchidraprotān bisam iva karī saṃkalayati VidSrk_29.9b *(905b)
GK22vidsriiu:2393: tarjanyā viṣakarburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya dantāṅkurān VidSrk_5.25b *(95b)
GK22vidsriiu:2394: talam āśrayati dinātapabhayena paripiṇḍitaṃ śaityam VidSrk_9.20b *(210b)
GK22vidsriiu:2395: talpādṛśyakaraṅkapañjaram idaṃ jīvena liptaṃ manāṅ VidSrk_22.49c *(748c)
GK22vidsriiu:2397: talpe campakakalpite sakhi gṛhodyāne 'dya suptāsi kiṃ VidSrk_20.21a
GK22vidsriiu:2402: tava jyānirghoṣaṃ nṛpatir iha ko nāma sahate VidSrk_41.28b *(1408b)

GK22vidsriiu:2405: tava yadi tathārūḍhaṃ prema prapannam imāṃ daśāṃ VidSrk_21.23c *(657c)
GK22vidsriiu:2406: tava śaṭhatayā śilpotkarṣo vidher vighaṭiṣyate VidSrk_18.23d *(557d)
GK22vidsriiu:2409: tasmāt sarvam akartṛkaṃ jagad idaṃ śreyo mataṃ saugatam VidSrk_16.57d
GK22vidsriiu:2411: tasminn adya punaḥ śrutipraṇayini pratyaṅgam utkampitaṃ VidSrk_15.17c
GK22vidsriiu:2412: tasminn eva gṛhodare rasavatī tatraiva sā kaṇḍanī VidSrk_39.7a *(1310a)
GK22vidsriiu:2413: tasminn eva prakṛtimahati vyomni labdho 'vakāśaḥ VidSrk_33.57d *(1075d)
GK22vidsriiu:2414: tasminn eva sarasy akālajaladenāgatya tacceṣṭitaṃ VidSrk_33.41c *(1059c)
GK22vidsriiu:2415: tasmin pañcaśare smare bhagavatā bhargeṇa bhasmīkṛte VidSrk_23.47a *(798a)
GK22vidsriiu:2416: tasya tvāṃ gilataḥ kapolamilanakleśo 'pi kiṃ jāyate VidSrk_33.105d
GK22vidsriiu:2417: tasya premṇas tad idam adhunā vaiśasaṃ paśya jātaṃ VidSrk_21.14c *(648c)
GK22vidsriiu:2418: tasya smeraśuceḥ kramasya ca girāṃ mugdhākṣarāṇāṃ hriyā VidSrk_19.20b
GK22vidsriiu:2419: tasyāgre paripuñjitena tamasā naktaṃdivaṃ sthīyate VidSrk_16.4d *(387d)
GK22vidsriiu:2422: tasyām adbhutapadmam ekam aniśaṃ protphullam ālokitam VidSrk_16.4b *(387b)
GK22vidsriiu:2424: tasyāmogham amūr bhavanti na hi ced astraṃ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ VidSrk_16.20d
GK22vidsriiu:2426: tasyāścaryaikamūrter api nabhasi vapur yatra durlakṣam āsīt VidSrk_41.9b
GK22vidsriiu:2427: tasyās tad vayam ekam evam asakṛd dhyāyanta evāsmahe VidSrk_23.42d *(793d)
GK22vidsriiu:2428: tasyās tāpabhuvaṃ nṛśaṃsa kathayāmy eṇīdṛśas te kathaṃ VidSrk_18.19a

GK22vidsriiu:2437: tasyāḥ sphuṭaṃ hṛdayam ity api na smareṣūṃs tau rakṣataḥ praviśato vim VidSrk_18.22b *(556b)
GK22vidsriiu:2439: tasyaitan me phalam upanataṃ nātha yat te viyogaḥ VidSrk_22.37d *(736d)
GK22vidsriiu:2440: tasyaivāstam upeyuṣaḥ karaśatāny ādāya vidhvaṃsayann VidSrk_33.84c
GK22vidsriiu:2441: tasyoraḥsthalam uttarīyaviṣaye sadyo mayā sañjitam VidSrk_19.10b *(568b)
GK22vidsriiu:2443: taṃ cemaṃ ca karoti mūḍhajaḍadhīḥ kāmāndhamugdho yatas VidSrk_35.12c
GK22vidsriiu:2444: taṃ janam asatyasaṃdhaṃ bhagavati vasudhe kathaṃ vahasi VidSrk_38.26b
GK22vidsriiu:2445: taṃ pannagas tam api tatsahitaṃ payodhiḥ VidSrk_36.3b *(1195b)
GK22vidsriiu:2446: taṃ labdhvā khalu bandhakīva suratavyāpāradakṣaṃ janaṃ VidSrk_25.13c
GK22vidsriiu:2447: taṃ vidvāṃsam iha stumaḥ karapuṭībhikṣālpaśāke 'pi vā VidSrk_48.16c
GK22vidsriiu:2448: tā api mām ativayasaṃ taraladṛśaḥ śaralam īkṣante VidSrk_43.5b *(1522b)
GK22vidsriiu:2449: tā ity ākṛtileśato manasi naḥ kiṃcit pratītiṃ gatāḥ VidSrk_49.53b *(1690b)
GK22vidsriiu:2451: tāḍīdalaṃ yad akaṭhoram idaṃ yad atra VidSrk_49.54a *(1691a)
GK22vidsriiu:2453: tātaḥ kiṃ bahu varṇyate sa bhagavān vaidarbhagarbheśvaraḥ VidSrk_50.39d

GK22vidsriiu:2455: tāto 'yaṃ naiṣa tātaḥ stanam urasi pitur dṛṣṭavān nāham atra VidSrk_5.20b
GK22vidsriiu:2457: tān dṛṣṭvārtham itas tato nikhanati svaṃ niḥsvam ātanvatī VidSrk_50.20d
GK22vidsriiu:2458: tān dhunvann ayam abhyupaiti madhurāmodo marud dakṣiṇaḥ VidSrk_8.23b
GK22vidsriiu:2459: tāny anyāni dināni muñca caraṇau saivāham anyo bhavān VidSrk_21.57d

GK22vidsriiu:2462: tāpaṃ ca saṃmadarasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca tanvañ VidSrk_41.58c *(1438c)

GK22vidsriiu:2469: tām āśāṃ pathikas tathāpi kim api dhyāyaṃś ciraṃ vīkṣate VidSrk_23.14d

GK22vidsriiu:2478: tārābhāḥ phaṇacakravālamaṇayo na syur yadi dyotino VidSrk_40.1c *(1333c)

GK22vidsriiu:2488: tāvat kathaṃ kathaya yāsi gṛhaṃ parasya VidSrk_42.30a *(1490a)

GK22vidsriiu:2492: tāvadbhiḥ parivāritā pṛthupṛthudvīpaiḥ samantād iyam VidSrk_4.9b *(38b)

GK22vidsriiu:2495: tāsāṃ tāsāṃ nayanam asakṛn naipuṇād vañcayitvā VidSrk_23.45b *(796b)
GK22vidsriiu:2496: tās trailokyavilakṣaṇaprakṛtayo vāmāḥ prasīdantu vaḥ VidSrk_16.1d *(384d)
GK22vidsriiu:2499: tāṃś ca tṛṇān iva dadhatī kalayasi vada gauravaṃ kasya VidSrk_42.35b

GK22vidsriiu:2513: tiṣṭhanti vārirāśer upari taraṅgās tale maṇayaḥ VidSrk_38.33b *(1286b)
GK22vidsriiu:2514: tiṣṭhantu nāma taravaḥ phalitā natāś ca VidSrk_33.18b *(1036b)

GK22vidsriiu:2521: tīrthaṃ na kvacid īdṛg atrabhavatī tvatkhaḍgadhārā yathā VidSrk_41.16b

GK22vidsriiu:2524: tīṣṇaṃ ravis tapati nīca ivācirāḍhyaḥ VidSrk_11.11a *(276a)
GK22vidsriiu:2527: tundī cet paricumbati priyatamāṃ svārthāt tato bhraśyati VidSrk_35.12a
GK22vidsriiu:2528: tundau tunditavigrahasya surate naiko bhaven nāparaḥ VidSrk_35.12d
GK22vidsriiu:2534: tulyas tvayā yadi paraṃ sahadeva eva VidSrk_41.76c *(1456c)

GK22vidsriiu:2540: tūṣṇīṃ śārivisāraṇāya nihitaḥ svedāmbugarbhaḥ karaḥ VidSrk_19.47d *(605d)
GK22vidsriiu:2543: tṛptas tatpiśitena satvaram asau tenaiva yātaḥ pathā VidSrk_40.2c *(1334c)
GK22vidsriiu:2544: tṛṣārtaḥ śāraṅgo viramati na khinne 'pi vapuṣi VidSrk_40.15b *(1347b)
GK22vidsriiu:2545: tṛṣārtānām īṣadvitatam adharāntaḥ prati gati- VidSrk_2.4c *(20c)
GK22vidsriiu:2546: tṛṣārtaiḥ śāraṅgaiḥ prati jaladharaṃ bhūri virutaṃ VidSrk_40.30a *(1362a)
GK22vidsriiu:2550: te kaṇṭhe loṭhayantaḥ parabhṛtavayasāṃ pañcamaṃ rāgarājaṃ VidSrk_34.21c

GK22vidsriiu:2552: te jaṅghe jaghanaṃ ca tat tad udaraṃ tau ca stanau tat smitaṃ

GK22vidsriiu:2554: tejasviny avaliptatā mukharatā vaktary aśaktiḥ sthire VidSrk_38.20c
GK22vidsriiu:2555: te jāne jaraṭhībhavanti vigalannīlatviṣaḥ pallavāḥ VidSrk_24.2d *(808d)
GK22vidsriiu:2557: te tasya sapta turagā na kadācid aṣṭau VidSrk_42.51d *(1511d)
GK22vidsriiu:2559: te dīrghāpāṅgapuṅkhāḥ smitaviṣaviṣamāḥ pakṣmalāḥ strīkaṭākṣāḥ VidSrk_14.2c

GK22vidsriiu:2561: te dvīpāntaramālino jaladhayaḥ kvāpi kvacid bhūbhṛtaḥ VidSrk_36.1b
GK22vidsriiu:2562: tena kiṃ na kṛto mṛtyur VidSrk_39.26c *(1329c)
GK22vidsriiu:2563: tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtir anaghā kīrtyā ca lokatrayam VidSrk_41.27d
GK22vidsriiu:2564: tena tvaṃ svajanaḥ kileti karaṭair yat tair upabrūyase VidSrk_33.19b
GK22vidsriiu:2565: tenākekaram īkṣitaṃ daśa śanair bāṇān ṛjūkurvatā VidSrk_45.13d *(1554d)
GK22vidsriiu:2567: tenāliṅgitamātra eva vidhivat prādurbhavan nirbhara- VidSrk_8.23c *(174c)
GK22vidsriiu:2569: tenāsmākam iyaṃ gatir matir iyaṃ saṃvittir evaṃvidhā VidSrk_23.15c *(766c)
GK22vidsriiu:2572: tenaikasya mamaiva tatra kaśipuprāptiḥ parā dṛśyate VidSrk_5.29b *(99b)
GK22vidsriiu:2574: tenaiveha mano haraty adharitaprauḍhā navoḍhā na kim VidSrk_19.5d *(563d)
GK22vidsriiu:2575: tenodgīya khalena garjati ghane smṛtvā priyāṃ yat kṛtaṃ VidSrk_49.24c
GK22vidsriiu:2576: te pāvanaṃ ca śiśiraṃ ca rasaṃ sṛjanti VidSrk_33.98d *(1116d)
GK22vidsriiu:2578: te bāṇāḥ kila cūtakuḍmalamayāḥ pauṣpaṃ dhanus tat kila VidSrk_23.18a
GK22vidsriiu:2579: te bhūmaṇḍalamaṇḍanaikatilakāḥ santaḥ kiyanto janāḥ VidSrk_37.26d *(1238d)
GK22vidsriiu:2580: te 'mī sphāṭikadaṇḍaḍambarajito jātāḥ sudhāṃśoḥ karāḥ VidSrk_29.57d
GK22vidsriiu:2581: te maulau bhavatāṃ milantu jagatīrājyābhiṣekocita- VidSrk_1.6c *(7c)
GK22vidsriiu:2582: te lakṣmīṃ narmayanto nidhuvanavidhayaḥ pāntu vo mādhavasya VidSrk_6.29d
GK22vidsriiu:2584: teṣām asṛk pibati saiva mahī hatānāṃ VidSrk_40.3c *(1335c)
GK22vidsriiu:2585: teṣām eva tale kṛtajñacaritaiḥ śuṣyadbhir apy āsyate VidSrk_33.24d
GK22vidsriiu:2587: teṣāṃ tṛṣaḥ pariṇamanti na yatra tatra VidSrk_36.15a *(1207a)
GK22vidsriiu:2588: teṣāṃ tvaṃ nidhir āgasām asahanā mānonnatā sāpy ato VidSrk_49.13a *(1650a)
GK22vidsriiu:2589: teṣāṃ dvāri nadanti vājinivahās tair eva labdhā kṣitiḥ VidSrk_41.30b
GK22vidsriiu:2590: teṣāṃ samuccayam anargham ahaṃ vidhāsye VidSrk_0.1d *(1d)
GK22vidsriiu:2593: te haṃsātithivatsalā jalaruhāṃ kālena pītāyuṣāṃ VidSrk_11.3a *(268a)
GK22vidsriiu:2594: tair etat samalaṃkṛtaṃ nijakulaṃ kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe VidSrk_41.30c
GK22vidsriiu:2595: tailotpūraḥ samudrāḥ kanakagirir ayaṃ vṛttavartiprarohaḥ VidSrk_41.77b
GK22vidsriiu:2596: tais tair jīvopahārair iha kuharaśilāsaṃśrayām arcayitvā VidSrk_35.44a
GK22vidsriiu:2598: taiḥ śeṣe kṛtakṛtyatām upagatair audāsyam ālambitaṃ VidSrk_48.44c *(1637c)
GK22vidsriiu:2599: toyaṃ tvayā tad api niṣkaruṇena pītam VidSrk_33.91d *(1109d)
GK22vidsriiu:2600: toyaṃ nirmathitaṃ ghṛtāya madhune niṣpīḍitaḥ prastaraḥ VidSrk_42.55a
GK22vidsriiu:2601: toyaṃ prasīdati muner iva dharmacintā VidSrk_11.11c *(276c)
GK22vidsriiu:2605: toyottīrṇāḥ śrayati kabarīḥ śekharaḥ saptalānāṃ VidSrk_9.19a *(209a)
GK22vidsriiu:2606: tyaktavye pathi mā kṛthāḥ punar api premapramādāspadam VidSrk_17.37d
GK22vidsriiu:2608: tyaktā yena guror girā vasumatī baddho yad ambhonidhiḥ VidSrk_40.27b
GK22vidsriiu:2609: tyaktvā tān bata haṃsi mām atikṛśāṃ bālām anāthāṃ striyaṃ VidSrk_22.2c
GK22vidsriiu:2610: tyaktvā śālicikartiṣām ita ito dhānvanty amī pāmarāḥ VidSrk_12.8d *(300d)
GK22vidsriiu:2611: tyajasi na śayanīyaṃ nekṣase svām avasthāṃ VidSrk_22.532a *(751a)
GK22vidsriiu:2612: tyajasi na satyonmukhatām iti satyaṃ vāsudevo 'si VidSrk_41.6b *(1386b)
GK22vidsriiu:2613: tyāgaḥ ko 'pi sa tasya bibhrati jaganty asyārthino 'py ambudāḥ

GK22vidsriiu:2921: devākarṇaya yena yena mahasā yad yat samāsāditam VidSrk_41.27b *(1407b)
GK22vidsriiu:2924: devi tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ko 'nyaḥ pṛthivyā gurur VidSrk_6.5a
GK22vidsriiu:2925: devi tvaṃ parihāsakelikalahe 'nantā tvam evety atha VidSrk_6.5c *(108c)
GK22vidsriiu:2926: devī sūnum asūta nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatety udbhuje VidSrk_5.1a *(71a)
GK22vidsriiu:2927: devīṃ kāntāradurgāṃ rudhiram upataru kṣetrapālāya dattvā VidSrk_35.44b
GK22vidsriiu:2928: devīṃ vācam upāsate hi bahavaḥ sāraṃ tu sārasvataṃ VidSrk_50.4a *(1701a)
GK22vidsriiu:2929: deve kālavaśaṃ gate savitari prāpyāntarāsaṃgatiṃ VidSrk_33.84a *(1102a)
GK22vidsriiu:2932: devo nidrādaridraḥ saphalayati harir yauvanarddhiṃ mameti VidSrk_32.9d
GK22vidsriiu:2934: devo yady api te guruḥ sa bhagavān ardhenducūḍāmaṇiḥ VidSrk_45.6a *(1547a)
GK22vidsriiu:2936: devyā devo jitaḥ kiṃ vṛṣaḍamarucitābhasmabhogīndracandrān VidSrk_5.28b
GK22vidsriiu:2937: devyāḥ sthāṇau caraṇapatite te nakhāḥ pāntu viśvam VidSrk_5.11d *(81d)
GK22vidsriiu:2939: deśair antaritā śataiś ca saritām urvībhṛtāṃ kānanair VidSrk_23.14a
GK22vidsriiu:2941: dehārdhe vahati tripiḍapagurur gaurīṃ svayaṃ śaṃkaraḥ VidSrk_16.81b
GK22vidsriiu:2943: dainyaṃ yad ādiśati tad vayam ācarāmaḥ VidSrk_42.42d *(1502d)

GK22vidsriiu:2945: daivāt kaṣṭadaśāvaśaṃ gatavataḥ siṃhasya tasyādhunā VidSrk_33.16c *(1034c)
GK22vidsriiu:2946: daivāt tato 'pi galito gilito bakena VidSrk_40.19c *(1351c)
GK22vidsriiu:2947: daivād ayaṃ yadi jano vidito 'parādhī VidSrk_21.47a *(681a)
GK22vidsriiu:2948: daivenāntaritapriyo 'si hariṇa tvaṃ cāpi kiṃ yac ciraṃ VidSrk_23.5c
GK22vidsriiu:2950: dordaṇḍo 'sau jayati jayinaḥ śārṅgiṇo mandarādri- VidSrk_6.39c *(142c)

GK22vidsriiu:2958: doṣair anyajanāśrito 'paṭavo jātāḥ sma ity adbhutam VidSrk_17.17d *(481d)
GK22vidsriiu:2959: doṣo 'bhūt kalakaṇṭhanāyaka nijas teṣāṃ svabhāvo hi sa VidSrk_33.19d
GK22vidsriiu:2961: dyām adyāpi tamas tu kauravakulaśrīcāṭukārāḥ karāḥ VidSrk_29.16b *(912b)
GK22vidsriiu:2962: dyām ālokayatāṃ kalāḥ kalayatāṃ chāyāḥ samācinvatāṃ VidSrk_49.12a *(1649a)
GK22vidsriiu:2966: dyauḥ pratyagradyumaṇivirahād vāntam akṣṇor na yāti VidSrk_27.8d *(865d)
GK22vidsriiu:2967: draṣṭavyo 'sy amum eva bhārgavabaṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kuṭhāraṃ vahan VidSrk_45.6c
GK22vidsriiu:2972: dvayam idam ayathārthaṃ dṛśyate madvidheṣu VidSrk_23.23b *(774b)
GK22vidsriiu:2975: dvayor dṛṣṭvālāpaṃ kalayati kathām ātmaviṣayām VidSrk_49.28b *(1665b)
GK22vidsriiu:2976: dvāraṃ khaḍgibhir āvṛtaṃ bahir api praklinnagaṇḍair gajair VidSrk_41.23a
GK22vidsriiu:2977: dvārāt trasyati citrakelisadaso veśaṃ viṣaṃ manyate VidSrk_22.46b *(745b)
GK22vidsriiu:2978: dvārālindakakoṇakeṣu nibhṛtaḥ sthitvā kṣipāmi kṣapām VidSrk_39.13b
GK22vidsriiu:2981: dviguṇaharimā māronmāthaḥ kathaṃ nu viraṃsyati VidSrk_23.51d *(802d)
GK22vidsriiu:2982: dvijasya śamino mama tribhuvanaṃ tad ity āśayo VidSrk_6.11c *(114c)
GK22vidsriiu:2983: dvijihvād anyeṣāṃ kva nanu guṇinām īśvarajuṣāṃ VidSrk_42.41c *(1501c)
GK22vidsriiu:2985: dvitrāṇy atra dināni ko na kupitaḥ ko nābhavan mānuṣaḥ VidSrk_21.31b
GK22vidsriiu:2986: dvitrāṇy eva padāni vāsabhavanād yāvan na yāty ātmanā VidSrk_21.62b
GK22vidsriiu:2987: dvitrāvaskandamandaḥ katham api calati syandano bhānavīyaḥ VidSrk_46.3d
GK22vidsriiu:2988: dvitrair vyomni purāṇamauktikamaṇicchāyaiḥ sthitaṃ tārakair VidSrk_30.8a
GK22vidsriiu:2993: dvis triḥ kokilayā rutaṃ tricaturaiś cūtāṅkurair udgataṃ VidSrk_8.5a
GK22vidsriiu:2994: dvīpāḥ patrāṇi meghā madhupakulam amūs tārakā garbhadhūlir VidSrk_6.43c
GK22vidsriiu:2995: dve tisro ramaṇīyam ambaramaṇer dyām uccarante rucaḥ VidSrk_30.4b *(960b)
GK22vidsriiu:2996: dveṣṭi svaṃ ca kacagrahavyavahitaśroṇīvihāraḥ karaḥ VidSrk_23.11b *(762b)
GK22vidsriiu:2997: dvairājyaṃ vidadhānam indudṛṣadāṃ bhindānam ambhaḥśirāḥ VidSrk_29.15b
GK22vidsriiu:2998: dvaividhyād anu pañcatāṃ tadanu ca traidaśyam āpa kṣaṇāt VidSrk_41.16d
GK22vidsriiu:3000: dhatte kautukarājanītinipuṇaḥ pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ VidSrk_4.41d *(70d)
GK22vidsriiu:3001: dhatte jaratkapir apīti kim atra vācyam VidSrk_33.34d *(1052d)
GK22vidsriiu:3003: dhatte dhāma ca dāma ca smitalasatkundendranīlaśriyoḥ VidSrk_49.2b
GK22vidsriiu:3004: dhatte padmatalād alepsur upari svaṃ karṇatālaṃ dvipaḥ VidSrk_31.9a
GK22vidsriiu:3005: dhatte vakṣaḥ kucasacivatām advitīyatvam āsyaṃ VidSrk_15.22c *(355c)
GK22vidsriiu:3006: dhanur mālā maurvī kvaṇadalikulaṃ lakṣyam abalā VidSrk_14.9a *(331a)
GK22vidsriiu:3007: dhanuṣi ca makare ca svastharekhāniveśaḥ VidSrk_22.41d *(740d)
GK22vidsriiu:3009: dhanyas tvaṃ sahakāra samprati phalaiḥ kākāñ śukān pūrayan VidSrk_33.85a
GK22vidsriiu:3010: dhanyaṃ janma sahāmunaikasamayaṃ na prāpya taptaṃ hṛdā VidSrk_49.15d
GK22vidsriiu:3012: dhanyānāṃ girikandarodarabhuvi jyotiḥ paraṃ dhyāyatām VidSrk_42.1a
GK22vidsriiu:3014: dhanyānāṃ bhavaneṣu pañjaraśukair āhāram abhyarthyate VidSrk_16.23d
GK22vidsriiu:3015: dhanyān paśyati locanena sakalenārdhena māṃ vīkṣate VidSrk_17.30b *(494b)
GK22vidsriiu:3017: dhanyā sā rajanī tad eva sudinaṃ puṇyaḥ sa eva kṣaṇo VidSrk_49.12c
GK22vidsriiu:3020: dhanyāḥ śṛṇvanti suptāḥ stanayugabharitoraḥsthalāḥ kāminīnām VidSrk_10.16d
GK22vidsriiu:3021: dhanyenādhim upāśruṇor asi kṛtātyantaṃ priyā roditā VidSrk_21.48d *(682d)
GK22vidsriiu:3024: dharmādridruma rājaśekhara sakhe dṛṣṭo 'si yāmo vayam VidSrk_50.17d
GK22vidsriiu:3025: dhātas trapā yadi na kiṃ na pariśramo 'pi VidSrk_39.18d *(1321d)
GK22vidsriiu:3028: dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi gopālakaḥ VidSrk_35.10d
GK22vidsriiu:3037: dhāvitveva kṛtapraṇāmakam aho premṇo vicitrā gatiḥ VidSrk_21.62d *(696d)
GK22vidsriiu:3038: dhāsyaty adya sitātapatrasubhagaṃ sā rājahaṃsī śiśoḥ VidSrk_9.9a *(199a)
GK22vidsriiu:3039: dhik kandarpadhanur bhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe VidSrk_16.74c
GK22vidsriiu:3040: dhik kaṣṭaṃ viṭapair viṭair iva vane kiṃ nāma nāceṣṭitam VidSrk_41.43d
GK22vidsriiu:3041: dhik candanaṃ kaiva sudhā varākī VidSrk_49.48a *(1685a)
GK22vidsriiu:3042: dhik tat sarvaṃ tava jalanidhe yad vimucyāśrudhārās VidSrk_33.26c *(1044c)
GK22vidsriiu:3043: dhik tasya mūḍhamanasaḥ kukaveḥ kavitvaṃ VidSrk_17.34a *(498a)
GK22vidsriiu:3044: dhik taṃ manuṣyapadam ātmani yaḥ prayuṅkte VidSrk_50.33d *(1730d)
GK22vidsriiu:3045: dhik tvāṃ dhik tava pauruṣaṃ dhig udayaṃ dhik kārmukaṃ dhik charān VidSrk_22.2d *(701d)
GK22vidsriiu:3046: dhig etad gāmbhīryaṃ dhig amṛtamayatvaṃ ca jaladher VidSrk_33.90a *(1108a)
GK22vidsriiu:3049: dhig dhātrā kṛpaṇena yena na kṛtāḥ kalpāntadīrghāyuṣaḥ VidSrk_37.30d
GK22vidsriiu:3050: dhig dhik tān kriminirviśeṣavapuṣaḥ sphūrjanmahāsiddhayo VidSrk_48.16a
GK22vidsriiu:3051: dhig dhik tān samayān pariśramarujo dhik tā giro niṣphalā VidSrk_50.6a
GK22vidsriiu:3052: dhig dhik tvām ayi kena durmukhi kṛtaṃ kiṃ kiṃ na kāyavrataṃ VidSrk_21.31a
GK22vidsriiu:3053: dhig dhik tvāṃ sahapāṃśukhelanasakhīloke 'pi yan nihnavaḥ VidSrk_22.13d
GK22vidsriiu:3054: dhig vṛddhatāṃ viṣalatām iva dhik tathāpi VidSrk_43.4a *(1521a)
GK22vidsriiu:3056: dhīrās ta eva śamasaukhyabhujas ta eva VidSrk_48.4b *(1597b)
GK22vidsriiu:3059: dhūtvā dhāvati kṛṣṇakīṭapaṭalaśreṇīṃ śikhaṇḍī śiro VidSrk_10.5c *(219c)
GK22vidsriiu:3063: dhūmeneva hate dṛśau visṛjato bāṣpaṃ pravāhakṣamaṃ VidSrk_18.14a *(548a)
GK22vidsriiu:3064: dhūmair antaritāḥ svabhāvamalinair āśā mahī tāpitā VidSrk_33.96b *(1114b)
GK22vidsriiu:3068: dhūmyāṭāḥ paryaṭanti prativiṭapam amī niṣṭhurāḥ svasthalīṣu VidSrk_35.40d
GK22vidsriiu:3069: dhūmraiḥ pakṣapuṭaiḥ patadbhir abhitaḥ pāṇḍūdaraiḥ khañjanair VidSrk_11.4a
GK22vidsriiu:3070: dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇān upavarṇayanti VidSrk_21.1d *(635d)
GK22vidsriiu:3071: dhūrtair indriyanāmabhiḥ praṇayitām āpādayadbhiḥ svayaṃ VidSrk_48.44a
GK22vidsriiu:3076: dhṛtam iva puraḥ paścāt kaiścit praṇunnam ivollasat- VidSrk_15.45a *(378a)
GK22vidsriiu:3077: dhṛtir dākṣīputre harati haricandro 'pi hṛdayam VidSrk_50.1b *(1698b)
GK22vidsriiu:3078: dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakabarībhāram aṃse vahantyāḥ VidSrk_6.22b
GK22vidsriiu:3079: dhemante jaḍatā tathaiva śiśire 'py āyāsyate vāyunā VidSrk_49.30b *(1667b)
GK22vidsriiu:3080: dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃcin mayā VidSrk_21.11c
GK22vidsriiu:3081: dhyātaṃ vittam aharniśaṃ na ca punas tattvāntaraṃ śāśvataṃ VidSrk_48.39c
GK22vidsriiu:3088: dhvanir api madhuras te na śrutaś cātakena VidSrk_33.62d *(1080d)
GK22vidsriiu:3089: dhvastaṃ kena vilepanaṃ kucayuge kenāñjanaṃ netrayor VidSrk_24.13a *(819a)
GK22vidsriiu:3091: dhvāntaṃ bhavanti ca viśuddhadṛśo divāndhāḥ VidSrk_27.2d *(859d)
GK22vidsriiu:3096: dhvāntaughād bhuvam uddhariṣyati hariḥ pātālagarbhād iva VidSrk_28.7d
GK22vidsriiu:3099: na kālindyāḥ kūle na ca niculakuñje muraripuḥ VidSrk_6.19d *(122d)
GK22vidsriiu:3103: na krodhānaladhūmarājir iva ca bhrūvallir ullāsitā VidSrk_41.22b *(1402b)
GK22vidsriiu:3105: na kṣoṇī nādrivargā na ca raviśaśinau sarvam ekārṇavaṃ syāt VidSrk_33.30d
GK22vidsriiu:3106: na kṣobhyanty eva tāvan niyamitasalilāḥ sarvaite samudrāḥ VidSrk_33.30b
GK22vidsriiu:3112: na khalu caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punar dayitena me VidSrk_21.32b *(666b)
GK22vidsriiu:3113: na khalu tava kadācit kopa evaṃvidho 'bhūt VidSrk_21.44b *(678b)
GK22vidsriiu:3114: na khalu vetsi navas tvam ihāgataḥ VidSrk_39.25b *(1328b)
GK22vidsriiu:3116: na ca jaṭharatām ālambante klamodayadāyinīm VidSrk_8.13d *(164d)
GK22vidsriiu:3117: na ca navapadakṣuṇṇo mārgaḥ kathaṃ nv aham ekakaḥ VidSrk_50.32b *(1729b)
GK22vidsriiu:3119: na ca vinimuñcati vātyāṃ varṣati nibhṛtaṃ mahāmeghaḥ VidSrk_33.75b
GK22vidsriiu:3120: na cāpi kāvyaṃ navam ity avadyam VidSrk_37.34b *(1246b)
GK22vidsriiu:3121: na cāmī te dantāḥ sudati jitakundendumahasaḥ VidSrk_16.40b *(423b)
GK22vidsriiu:3122: na cāsmābhir dṛṣṭā nayanapathagamyasya maṇayaḥ VidSrk_33.31b *(1049b)
GK22vidsriiu:3123: na cec cintāpātre milati katham apy asya manasaḥ VidSrk_49.57b *(1694b)
GK22vidsriiu:3124: na ced evaṃ tādṛk kamalakalikārdhapratinidhau VidSrk_38.13c *(1266c)
GK22vidsriiu:3125: na caiṣāvajñaiṣām api tu nijavittavyayabhayam VidSrk_42.8b *(1468b)
GK22vidsriiu:3126: na janayasi kaṃsaharṣaṃ vahasi śarīraṃ yaśodayā juṣṭam VidSrk_41.6a
GK22vidsriiu:3127: na jānīmas tasyā bata katham amī yānti divasāḥ VidSrk_23.29d *(780d)
GK22vidsriiu:3128: na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kiyad anena vyavasitaṃ VidSrk_21.49c *(683c)
GK22vidsriiu:3129: na jāne kasyaiṣā pariṇatir udārasya tapasaḥ VidSrk_48.1d *(1594d)
GK22vidsriiu:3130: na jāne ko hetuḥ sphuṭati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam VidSrk_21.63d *(697d)
GK22vidsriiu:3131: na jāne saṃsāraḥ kim amṛtamayaḥ kiṃ viṣamayaḥ VidSrk_48.10d *(1603d)
GK22vidsriiu:3132: na ḍhaukante pātuṃ jhaṭiti makarandaṃ madhulihaḥ VidSrk_9.10d *(200d)
GK22vidsriiu:3133: na tac citraṃ yat te vitatakaravālograrasano VidSrk_32.19a *(1013a)
GK22vidsriiu:3136: na tāvad bimboṣṭhi sphuritanavarāgo 'yam adharo VidSrk_16.40a *(423a)
GK22vidsriiu:3137: natim iva phalanamraiḥ kurvate 'mī śirobhiḥ VidSrk_35.42b *(1189b)
GK22vidsriiu:3141: na daśati punas tārāśaṅkī divāpi sitotpalaṃ VidSrk_40.23c *(1355c)
GK22vidsriiu:3142: na dīnas tvaṃ puṇyaprabhavaramaṇīnāṃ vilasitair VidSrk_41.80a *(1460a)
GK22vidsriiu:3143: na dṛṣṭo bhāṇḍīre taṭabhuvi na govardhanagirer VidSrk_6.19c *(122c)
GK22vidsriiu:3145: na nāma syād bāṣpāgamaviṣadaṃ locanayugam VidSrk_21.8b *(642b)
GK22vidsriiu:3146: na nīlābjaṃ cakṣuḥ sarasiruham etan na vadanaṃ VidSrk_16.26a *(409a)
GK22vidsriiu:3147: na netrābjaṃ rajyaty anuṣajati na bhrūr api bhidām VidSrk_21.54b *(688b)
GK22vidsriiu:3148: nandī dvāri bahiḥkṛto guṇanidhiḥ kaṣṭaṃ kim atrocyatāṃ VidSrk_40.35c
GK22vidsriiu:3150: nanv asti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ VidSrk_24.10d *(816d)
GK22vidsriiu:3151: nanv etan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmīty ato rudyate VidSrk_21.19d *(653d)
GK22vidsriiu:3152: na patibhujayor niṣyandāntaḥ priyā niravīyata VidSrk_19.53d *(611d)
GK22vidsriiu:3155: na pratyemi janasya yad virahiṇo yāsyanti soḍhuṃ niśāḥ VidSrk_10.14d
GK22vidsriiu:3157: na prāptāni purā na samprati na ca prāptau dṛḍhapratyayo VidSrk_48.11c
GK22vidsriiu:3158: na bata vidhṛtaḥ kāñcīsthāne karaḥ ślathavāsasi VidSrk_19.37a *(595a)
GK22vidsriiu:3159: na bandhūkasyedaṃ kusumam adharas taddyutidharaḥ VidSrk_16.26b *(409b)
GK22vidsriiu:3160: na bhavatu kathaṃ kadambaḥ pratipratīkaprarūḍhaghanapulakaḥ VidSrk_33.76a
GK22vidsriiu:3162: nabhastaḥ syandante sarita iva dīrghā daśa diśaḥ VidSrk_11.13d *(278d)
GK22vidsriiu:3164: na bhujalatikāgāḍhāśleṣaiḥ śramaṃ lalitā yayur VidSrk_19.52c *(610c)
GK22vidsriiu:3165: namañ janmany asminn aham atanur agre 'py anatibhāṅ VidSrk_4.7c *(36c)
GK22vidsriiu:3167: na mando vaktrenduḥ śrayati na lalāṭaṃ kuṭilatā VidSrk_21.54a *(688a)
GK22vidsriiu:3171: namasyāmo devān nanu hatavidhes te 'pi vaśagā VidSrk_49.36a *(1673a)
GK22vidsriiu:3172: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhir api na yebhyaḥ prabhavati VidSrk_49.36d *(1673d)
GK22vidsriiu:3173: na māṃ trātus tātaḥ prabhavati na cāmbā na bhavatī VidSrk_22.11d *(710d)
GK22vidsriiu:3177: namrāḥ pādanakheṣu yasya daśasu brahmeśakṛṣṇās trayas VidSrk_1.2a *(3a)
GK22vidsriiu:3178: namrībhūtaiḥ phalam abhinavaṃ prāpyate yady avaśyaṃ VidSrk_41.74c *(1454c)
GK22vidsriiu:3180: nayatīva kālakaulaḥ kvāpi nabhaḥsairibhaṃ siddhyai VidSrk_27.23b *(880b)

GK22vidsriiu:4671: yat puṃskokilakūjitaṃ vidadhate tan nānurūpaṃ param VidSrk_33.43d *(1061d)
GK22vidsriiu:4672: yat pratyaṅgaṃ taṭam anusaranty ūrmayo vibhramāṇāṃ VidSrk_15.32a *(365a)
GK22vidsriiu:4673: yatrākṛṣṭakucāṃśuke mayi ruṣā vastrāya patrāṇi te VidSrk_47.9c *(1585c)

GK22vidsriiu:4682: yatrodyatpulakaiḥ prakampavikalair aṅgaiḥ kva karṇotpalaṃ VidSrk_49.14c

GK22vidsriiu:4685: yatsaṃkhyeṣu cakāra śīkarakaṇair eva dviṣāṃ durdinam VidSrk_45.18b
GK22vidsriiu:4692: yathāyaṃ bhāty aṃśūn diśi diśi kiran kundaviśadān VidSrk_29.43a *(939a)

GK22vidsriiu:4695: yad atraiva brahmā pibati nijam āyur madhu punar VidSrk_33.49c *(1067c)
GK22vidsriiu:4698: yad api ca na kṛtaṃ nitambinīnāṃ VidSrk_43.2c *(1519c)
GK22vidsriiu:4699: yad api vibudhaiḥ sindhor antaḥ kathaṃcid upārjitaṃ VidSrk_16.18a *(401a)
GK22vidsriiu:4700: yad amṛtarasāsārasrudbhir dhinoty akhilaṃ jagaj VidSrk_23.43c *(794c)
GK22vidsriiu:4701: yad ambā tāto vā dvayam idam agād ekatanutāṃ VidSrk_5.15a *(85a)
GK22vidsriiu:4702: yad ambhaḥ samprāptaṃ pramadavanavāpyās taṭabhuvam VidSrk_31.10b *(990b)
GK22vidsriiu:4704: yad arirudhiraṃ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ kusumbharasāruṇaṃ VidSrk_32.21c *(1015c)

GK22vidsriiu:4706: yad asi tulām adhirūḍhaṃ kāñcana guñjāphalaiḥ sārdham VidSrk_33.99b
GK22vidsriiu:4708: yad asyāḥ pratyaṅgaṃ nayanajalabindur viharati VidSrk_21.49d *(683d)
GK22vidsriiu:4709: yadā kiṃcijjño 'haṃ gaja iva madāndhaḥ samabhavaṃ VidSrk_37.5a *(1217a)
GK22vidsriiu:4710: yadā kiṃcit kiṃcid budhajanasakāśād adhigataṃ VidSrk_37.5c *(1217c)
GK22vidsriiu:4711: yadā tu cakṣuḥpatham eti dehināṃ VidSrk_37.22c *(1234c)
GK22vidsriiu:4713: yad ādatte dṛśyād akhilam api bhāvavyatikaraṃ VidSrk_15.3c *(336c)
GK22vidsriiu:4714: yadā pūrvaṃ nāsīd upari ca yadā naiva bhavitā VidSrk_48.42a *(1635a)
GK22vidsriiu:4715: yadā vigṛhṇāti tadā hataṃ yaśaḥ VidSrk_49.37a *(1674a)
GK22vidsriiu:4716: yadā śambhuś cumbaty acaladuhitur vaktrakamalam VidSrk_4.33d *(62d)
GK22vidsriiu:4717: yad āsādya svacchaṃ vilasatha vinītaklamabharāḥ VidSrk_33.51b *(1069b)
GK22vidsriiu:4719: yadā hatvā kṛtsnāṃ timirapaṭalīṃ jātamahimā VidSrk_33.50a *(1068a)
GK22vidsriiu:4720: yadi kṣāmā mūrttiḥ pratidivasam aśrūṇi dṛśi cec VidSrk_23.22a *(773a)
GK22vidsriiu:4721: yadi candrakarāḥ savahnayo nanu jāyeta sudhā kṛto 'nyataḥ VidSrk_37.25b
GK22vidsriiu:4722: yadi tad aguṇaṃ kaṇṭhe mā dhās tathorasi mā kṛthā VidSrk_41.38c *(1418c)
GK22vidsriiu:4723: yadi na pibed adharāmṛtaṃ priyasya VidSrk_19.28d *(586d)
GK22vidsriiu:4725: yadi niyamitaṃ dhyāne cetaḥ kathaṃ pulakodgamaḥ VidSrk_21.4c *(638c)
GK22vidsriiu:4726: yadi niśāpatir ahni kuto nu sa VidSrk_17.40b *(504b)
GK22vidsriiu:4728: yadi punar atanuśilīmukhasamākulā kiṃ na paryāptam VidSrk_15.44b *(377b)
GK22vidsriiu:4731: yadi vinihitā śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ kim u sthirakautukā VidSrk_21.4a *(638a)
GK22vidsriiu:4732: yadi viracito maune yatnaḥ kim u sphurito 'dharaḥ VidSrk_21.4b *(638b)
GK22vidsriiu:4733: yadi śaśadharas tvadvaktreṇa prasahya tiraskṛtas VidSrk_23.43a *(794a)
GK22vidsriiu:4734: yadi sanmārgajalāśaya nakro na kroḍam adhivasati VidSrk_33.74b *(1092b)
GK22vidsriiu:4735: yadi sarojam idaṃ kva niśi prabhā VidSrk_17.40a *(504a)
GK22vidsriiu:4736: yad iha jarāsv api mānmathā vikārāḥ VidSrk_43.2b *(1519b)
GK22vidsriiu:4738: yad uktaṃ pratyuktaṃ tad apaṭu śiraḥkampanaparaṃ VidSrk_21.3c *(637c)
GK22vidsriiu:4741: yad etat svacchandaṃ virahaṇam akārpaṇyam aśanaṃ VidSrk_48.1a *(1594a)
GK22vidsriiu:4742: yad etad dhanyānām urasi yuvatīsaṅgasamaye VidSrk_19.11a *(569a)
GK22vidsriiu:4743: yad etad vāgarthavyatikaramayaṃ kiṃcid amṛtaṃ VidSrk_50.18a *(1715a)
GK22vidsriiu:4744: yad etan netrāmbhaḥ patad api samāsādya taruṇī- VidSrk_21.28a *(662a)
GK22vidsriiu:4746: yad etasyāṃ śaśvat paravaśam ivonmattam iva ca VidSrk_16.41d *(424d)
GK22vidsriiu:4748: yad etān ālabhya pratiparurudānaṃ janayati VidSrk_40.13d *(1345d)
GK22vidsriiu:4749: yad ete sādhūnām upari vimukhāḥ santi dhanino VidSrk_42.8a *(1468a)
GK22vidsriiu:4750: yad gandhamātram api tāpam apākaroti VidSrk_33.18d *(1036d)

GK22vidsriiu:4754: yaddākṣiṇyarasād bhiyā ca sahasā narmopacārāṇy api VidSrk_21.10b *(644b)
GK22vidsriiu:4755: yad daurbalyaṃ vapuṣi mahatī sarvataś cāspṛhā yan VidSrk_22.16a *(715a)
GK22vidsriiu:4756: yad dhārārpitadṛṣṭibhiḥ kṣitibhujāṃ vidvadbhir apy āsyate VidSrk_42.6d

GK22vidsriiu:4762: yady acchinnaṃ daśamukhaśiras tasya tasyaiva kāntau VidSrk_45.12c *(1553c)
GK22vidsriiu:4763: yad yad iṣṭataraṃ tat tad VidSrk_38.22a *(1275a)
GK22vidsriiu:4764: yady api daivāt sneho naśyati sādhos tathāpi sattveṣu VidSrk_37.41a
GK22vidsriiu:4765: yady apy ahaṃ śaśimukhī vimalāmbaraśrīr VidSrk_11.2a *(267a)
GK22vidsriiu:4766: yady asmāsu parāṅmukho 'si vayam apy ekāntato niḥspṛhāḥ VidSrk_37.10d

GK22vidsriiu:4774: yad vrīḍābharabhugnam āsyakamalaṃ yac cakṣur atyullasat VidSrk_19.5a
GK22vidsriiu:4777: yan nāpnoti manaḥ samīhitaphalaṃ daivasya sā vācyatā VidSrk_42.22b
GK22vidsriiu:4778: yannāmāpi sukhākaroti kalayaty urvīm api dyām iva VidSrk_16.52a *(435a)
GK22vidsriiu:4780: yan nīḍaprabhavo yad añjanarucir yat khecaro yad dvijas VidSrk_33.19a
GK22vidsriiu:4781: yan netrais tribhir īkṣate na giriśo nāṣṭābhir apy abjabhūḥ VidSrk_37.37a
GK22vidsriiu:4783: yanmatidātravilūne śiloñcham iva kurvate kavayaḥ VidSrk_50.12b *(1709b)
GK22vidsriiu:4786: yan muñcanty upabhogabhāñjy api dhanāny ekāntato niḥspṛhāḥ VidSrk_48.11b
GK22vidsriiu:4787: yam uccair ākarṇya tridaśapatir apy āhavabhiyā VidSrk_41.28c *(1408c)
GK22vidsriiu:4788: yallagnaṃ hṛdi puṃsāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ śiro na ghūrṇayati VidSrk_50.24a
GK22vidsriiu:4789: yallajjā niruṇaddhi yatra śapathair utpādyate pratyayas VidSrk_21.10c
GK22vidsriiu:4790: yal liptaṃ kucacandanena sutanor adyāpi candracchalāc VidSrk_18.9c *(543c)
GK22vidsriiu:4795: yaś cakre tripuravyayaṃ tripathagā yanmūrdhni mālyāyate VidSrk_4.1b *(30b)
GK22vidsriiu:4796: yaś cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ yenāgamat keśaṭaḥ VidSrk_50.36b *(1733b)

GK22vidsriiu:4798: yas tu na viṣaṃ na vṛṣabho na bhasma tasyātra kā gaṇanā VidSrk_42.23b
GK22vidsriiu:4799: yas tv enaṃ sabalaṃ ca jetum abhitas tatkampamātraṃ bhruvor VidSrk_1.8c
GK22vidsriiu:4800: yasmāc cāyaṃ hṛdayarahito durvidhaḥ sarvadaiva VidSrk_38.41d *(1294d)
GK22vidsriiu:4802: yasminn āpast tadadhikaraṇasyāsya vahner nivṛttiḥ VidSrk_36.20a *(1212a)

GK22vidsriiu:4804: yasmin vittavyayabharasaho grāhakas tāvad āstāṃ VidSrk_33.5c *(1023c)
GK22vidsriiu:4806: yasmin hāsamayo vilimpati diśo lāvaṇyabālātapaḥ VidSrk_17.10b *(474b)
GK22vidsriiu:4807: yasya dvīpaṃ dharitrī sa ca jaladhir abhūd yasya gaṇḍūṣatoyaṃ VidSrk_41.9a
GK22vidsriiu:4809: yasya puraḥ surakariṇaḥ sāṅkuramāṣopamā jātaḥ VidSrk_6.9b *(112b)
GK22vidsriiu:4810: yasya bhremur amandadundubhiravair āśārudho ghoṣaṇāḥ VidSrk_46.5d *(1567d)
GK22vidsriiu:4812: yasya yathā vijñānaṃ tādṛk tasyeha hṛdayasadbhāvaḥ VidSrk_50.31a *(1728a)
GK22vidsriiu:4815: yasyāgre cirasaṃcitāni hṛdaye duḥkhāni saukhyāni vā VidSrk_42.47c *(1507c)
GK22vidsriiu:4816: yasyādho 'dhas tathopary upari niravadhi bhrāmyato viśvam aśvair
GK22vidsriiu:4818: yasyāntaś ca bahiś ca dṛṣṭam akhilaṃ trailokyam avyāt sa vaḥ VidSrk_6.34d
GK22vidsriiu:4821: yasyāmībhir itas tataś ca viśikhair āpuṅkhamagnātmabhir VidSrk_23.47c
GK22vidsriiu:4823: yasyāḥ kṛte nṛpatayas tṛṇavat tyajanti VidSrk_40.3a *(1335a)
GK22vidsriiu:4824: yasyāḥ phalaṃ bandhanam eva jātam VidSrk_42.15d *(1475d)
GK22vidsriiu:4827: yasyaitan nābhipadmaṃ bhuvanam iti sa vaḥ śarma devo dadātu VidSrk_6.43d
GK22vidsriiu:4828: yasyotsphālakutūhalena katham apy aṅgeṣu jīrṇāyitam VidSrk_6.32d *(135d)
GK22vidsriiu:4832: yasyodyoge balānāṃ sakṛd api calatām ujjihānaī rajobhir VidSrk_46.3a
GK22vidsriiu:4836: yaṃ daṃṣṭrayā spṛśati taṃ kila hanti sarpaḥ VidSrk_38.15b *(1268b)
GK22vidsriiu:4838: yaṃ dhyāyantyāḥ sumukhi likhitaṃ kajjalakledabhāñji VidSrk_22.36c *(735c)
GK22vidsriiu:4839: yaṃ prāk pratyag avāg udañci kakubhāṃ nāmāni sambibhrataṃ VidSrk_29.21a
GK22vidsriiu:4840: yaṃ saṃcintya dukūlavahnisadṛśaḥ saṃlakṣyate vāḍavaḥ VidSrk_36.8b *(1200b)
GK22vidsriiu:4841: yaḥ kūrmasya dināni nāma katicid viśrāmadānakṣamaḥ VidSrk_33.87d *(1105d)
GK22vidsriiu:4842: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva ca varas tāś candragarbhā niśāḥ VidSrk_24.9a
GK22vidsriiu:4844: yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva sa VidSrk_49.33b *(1670b)
GK22vidsriiu:4845: yaḥ śaktyā samalaṃkṛto 'pi śaśinaṃ śrīśailajāṃ svardhunīṃ VidSrk_4.41c
GK22vidsriiu:4847: yaḥ sāmudrīr aviratam imās tejasi sve juhoti VidSrk_36.20d *(1212d)
GK22vidsriiu:4848: yaḥ strīmukhaṃ ca śaśinaṃ ca samīkaroti VidSrk_17.34b *(498b)
GK22vidsriiu:4849: yaḥ svān api prathamam astasamastasādhu- VidSrk_38.18a *(1271a)
GK22vidsriiu:4851: yācñādainyaparāñci yasya kalahāyante mithas tvaṃ vṛṇu VidSrk_45.2c
GK22vidsriiu:4852: yācyo na kaścana guruḥ pratimā ca kāntā VidSrk_14.11a *(333a)
GK22vidsriiu:4853: yātasyāstam anantaraṃ dinakṛto veṣeṇa rāgānvitaḥ VidSrk_29.26a *(922a)
GK22vidsriiu:4854: yātaṃ yac ca nirambayor gurutayā mandaṃ viṣādād iva VidSrk_17.52b *(516b)
GK22vidsriiu:4856: yātāyātam ayantritaṃ jalanidher nādyāpi viśrāmyati VidSrk_6.2d *(105d)
GK22vidsriiu:4857: yātā locanagocaraṃ yadi vidher eṇekṣaṇā sundarī VidSrk_16.57a *(440a)
GK22vidsriiu:4858: yātā vāmatayaiva me 'dya sutarāṃ prītyai navoḍhā priyā VidSrk_17.5d
GK22vidsriiu:4860: yāty utsarpadvimalakiraṇair yais tirodhānam indur VidSrk_5.11c *(81c)
GK22vidsriiu:4862: yā tvaṃ svayam akṛtajñaṃ jaḍam akulīnaṃ na saṃspṛśati VidSrk_42.14b
GK22vidsriiu:4864: yānto yānti sadā samarpitaguṇāḥ ślāghyāḥ parām unnatim VidSrk_40.37d
GK22vidsriiu:4866: yāntyā muhur valitakandharam ānanaṃ tad VidSrk_17.19a *(483a)
GK22vidsriiu:4869: yām adhvanyajanaḥ svamātaram iva klāntacchide dhāvati VidSrk_33.44d
GK22vidsriiu:4871: yāminyās tilakaḥ kalā mṛgadṛśāṃ premavrataikāśramaḥ VidSrk_29.59c *(955c)
GK22vidsriiu:4872: yām ekaḥ svaśarīraśuddhirasiko mūrdhi pratīcchan ripur VidSrk_41.16c
GK22vidsriiu:4873: yāvac ca pratisāmasāraṇavidhivyagrau karau brahmaṇaḥ VidSrk_50.40c
GK22vidsriiu:4874: yāvat kiṃcid udantam ātmakamitus tāvat sa evety atha VidSrk_22.14c *(713c)
GK22vidsriiu:4879: yāvan nirvāhayati bhavatī yena vā kenacid vā VidSrk_39.3b *(1306b)
GK22vidsriiu:4880: yāvan no sakhi gocaraṃ nayanayor āyāti tāvad drutaṃ VidSrk_21.42a *(676a)
GK22vidsriiu:4881: yāval līlāvatīnāṃ na hṛdi dhṛtimuṣo dṛṣṭibāṇāḥ patanti VidSrk_49.40d
GK22vidsriiu:4883: yāsāṃ chedanam antareṇa patito nāyaṃ kuṭhāras tvayi VidSrk_33.81d *(1099d)
GK22vidsriiu:4884: yāsāṃ saty api sadguṇānusaraṇe doṣānurāgaḥ sadā VidSrk_16.1a *(384a)
GK22vidsriiu:4885: yā sīmante maṇibhir aruṇaiḥ sā cchavir bandhujīvair VidSrk_11.22c *(287c)
GK22vidsriiu:4886: yāḥ kṛcchrād abhilaṅghya lubdhakabhayāt tair eva reṇūtkarair VidSrk_8.7c
GK22vidsriiu:4887: yāḥ prāṇān varam arpayanti na punaḥ sampūrṇadṛṣṭiṃ priye VidSrk_16.1b
GK22vidsriiu:4889: yuktaṃ mānada mām ananyamanasaṃ vakṣaḥsthalasthāyinīṃ VidSrk_6.35a *(138a)
GK22vidsriiu:4891: yugaṃ naiva skandhe vahati nitarāṃ yāti dharaṇīṃ VidSrk_49.46c *(1683c)
GK22vidsriiu:4892: yuvatiṣu kim apy avyākhyeyaṃ smarasya vijṛmbhitam VidSrk_19.52d *(610d)
GK22vidsriiu:4893: yuṣmākaṃ kurutāṃ bhavārtiśamanaṃ netre tanur vā hareḥ VidSrk_6.16d *(119d)
GK22vidsriiu:4894: yuṣmābhis tribhir ebhir arpitatanus tvatkīrtir ujjṛmbhiṇī VidSrk_32.22c
GK22vidsriiu:4895: yuṣmābhiḥ priyakāminīparigataiḥ sthātavyam asmād iti VidSrk_8.19d *(170d)
GK22vidsriiu:4896: yūnor manas tad api vāñchati jetum eva VidSrk_19.48d *(606d)

GK22vidsriiu:6470: svasti śrīmalayācalāt smarasakhaḥ śrīmān vasantānilaḥ VidSrk_8.19a *(170a)
GK22vidsriiu:6471: svasti sukhebhyaḥ samprati salilāñjalir eva manmathakathāyāḥ VidSrk_43.5a
GK22vidsriiu:6472: svasthās tiṣṭhata daivam eva jagataḥ śāntau kṣaye cākulam VidSrk_40.2d
GK22vidsriiu:6473: svasthāḥ saty api yauvanodayamahāvyādhiprakope 'pi ye VidSrk_37.26c
GK22vidsriiu:6474: svasthāḥ sukhaṃ vasata kiṃ parayācanābhiḥ VidSrk_42.51b *(1511b)
GK22vidsriiu:6475: svasmāt karān mama kare valayaṃ kṣipantyā VidSrk_19.29c *(587c)
GK22vidsriiu:6477: svaṃ varṇayasy atha kathaṃ kulaputra mānī VidSrk_42.30c *(1490c)
GK22vidsriiu:6478: svaṃ saṃketam adūram eva kamitur bhrūsaṃjñayā śaṃsatī VidSrk_24.21c
GK22vidsriiu:6480: svādhīnām anukūlinīṃ svagṛhiṇīm āliṅgya yat supyate VidSrk_24.17c *(823c)
GK22vidsriiu:6481: svādhīne 'pi vane tathāpi kṛpaṇā yācanta ity adbhutam VidSrk_48.5d
GK22vidsriiu:6482: svāntaṃ premapayodhipaṅkapatanān niśceṣṭam āste gatam VidSrk_17.39b
GK22vidsriiu:6483: svāny aṅgāni śarīra eva hi nije nihnotum ākāṅkṣati VidSrk_13.8d *(313d)
GK22vidsriiu:6484: svāminn aṅkamṛgaḥ kiyanti hi dināny etasya vartiṣyate VidSrk_32.13d
GK22vidsriiu:6485: svāmin manmatha tādṛśaṃ punar api svapnādbhutaṃ darśaya VidSrk_23.28d
GK22vidsriiu:6486: svārthaṃ cet kurute priyādhararasāsvādaṃ na vindaty asau VidSrk_35.12b
GK22vidsriiu:6488: svārthe katham alasatvaṃ katham anusatvaṃ hitakaraṇe matir asya VidSrk_2.6b *(22b)
GK22vidsriiu:6489: svārthodyamo bhavati no mahatāṃ kadācit VidSrk_40.41d *(1373d)
GK22vidsriiu:6490: svāṃ kālatāṃ tyajati jātu na kālakūṭaḥ VidSrk_40.17d *(1349d)
GK22vidsriiu:6491: svāṃ mūrtiṃ dayitām ivātirasikāṃ tvadvidviṣaḥ śerate VidSrk_41.19d
GK22vidsriiu:6493: svecchārambhaṃ luṭhitvā pitur urasi citābhasmadhūlīcitāṅgo VidSrk_5.21a
GK22vidsriiu:6497: svedāmbhaḥkaṇadāyi vepanam idaṃ tyaktvā bhaja svasthatāṃ VidSrk_25.12c
GK22vidsriiu:6500: svedārdraṃ mukham ātapena galitā nīvī gamād āgamād VidSrk_25.14c *(850c)
GK22vidsriiu:6501: svairaṃ cakrānuvṛttyā muhur upari paribhramya samyakkṛtāsthaḥ VidSrk_35.3a
GK22vidsriiu:6503: svairaṃ locanavakrimā vilasati śrīḥ kācid ujjṛmbhate VidSrk_15.39d *(372d)
GK22vidsriiu:6504: svairaṃ śītakaraḥ karaṃ kamanilīm āliṅgituṃ yojayan VidSrk_29.26b *(922b)
GK22vidsriiu:6507: svairaṃ sarpan sṛjati gagane gatvarān patrabhaṅgān VidSrk_35.27d *(1174d)
GK22vidsriiu:6508: svairiṇyāḥ priyaveśmavartma diśatā vidyudvilāsair muhuḥ VidSrk_10.19d
GK22vidsriiu:6509: svairendhasphoṭanāya dvijabhavanam anu snātakaḥ sāyam eti VidSrk_35.23d
GK22vidsriiu:6510: svairotphālagatikrameṇa parito bhrāntvā salīlaṃ muhuḥ VidSrk_35.36b
GK22vidsriiu:6513: hatau rambhāstambhau hatam ahaha bandhūkakusumaṃ VidSrk_16.17c *(400c)
GK22vidsriiu:6514: hatau hemnaḥ kumbhāv ahaha vihataḥ pārvaṇaśaśī VidSrk_16.17d *(400d)
GK22vidsriiu:6515: hatvānaṅgaṃ kim iva hi ruṣā sādhitaṃ tryambakeṇa VidSrk_1.3b *(4b)
GK22vidsriiu:6517: hatvainaṃ kariṇāṃ sahasram akhilaṃ kiṃ labdham āyuṣmatā VidSrk_33.42b
GK22vidsriiu:6518: hanta dhvānta kim edhase diśi diśi vyomnaḥ pratispardhayā VidSrk_33.84b
GK22vidsriiu:6521: haratitarāṃ janahṛdayaṃ kalikopagatā latā ca dayitā ca VidSrk_15.44a
GK22vidsriiu:6524: harati hṛdayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ karoty avaśāṃ tanum VidSrk_22.35b *(734b)
GK22vidsriiu:6528: harahṛdayataḍāgarājahaṃsī diśatu śivaṃ jagataś ciraṃ bhavānī VidSrk_5.16b
GK22vidsriiu:6531: harir alasavilocanaḥ sagarvaṃ balam avalokya punar jagāma nidrām VidSrk_45.17a *(1558a)
GK22vidsriiu:6532: hare jīmūtānāṃ dhvanir ayam udīrṇo na kariṇām VidSrk_33.53b *(1071b)
GK22vidsriiu:6534: harer jayati nihnutaḥ prakaṭitaś ca vakroktibhiḥ VidSrk_6.11d *(114d)
GK22vidsriiu:6535: harer nābhīpadmaḥ prabhavati hi sarvatra niyatiḥ VidSrk_33.49b *(1067b)
GK22vidsriiu:6543: hasitam amṛtaṃ hanta svādoḥ paraṃ rasasampadaḥ VidSrk_17.66b *(530b)
GK22vidsriiu:6546: hastaprāpyam ivāmbaraṃ vidadhataḥ kharvā ivāśātatīr VidSrk_10.21a *(235a)
GK22vidsriiu:6549: hastābhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ VidSrk_21.6c
GK22vidsriiu:6554: haṃsānām udayo 'stu pūrṇaśaśinaḥ stād bhadram indīvare VidSrk_17.69b
GK22vidsriiu:6555: haṃsānāṃ ninadeṣu yaiḥ kavalitair āsajyate kūjatām VidSrk_11.19a *(284a)
GK22vidsriiu:6556: haṃsāḥ kaṃsāridehatviṣi gaganatale śaṅkhaśobhāṃ vahanti VidSrk_11.18d
GK22vidsriiu:6557: haṃsair jarjararūkṣapakṣamalinair naktaṃ divāntar bahis VidSrk_13.6a
GK22vidsriiu:6558: haṃho kānta rahogatena bhavatā yat pūrvam āveditaṃ VidSrk_20.13a *(624a)
GK22vidsriiu:6559: haṃho candra kathaṃ niṣiñcasi mayi jvālāmuco vedanāḥ VidSrk_23.48d *(799d)
GK22vidsriiu:6560: haṃho janāḥ pratipathaṃ pratikānanaṃ ca VidSrk_33.18a *(1036a)
GK22vidsriiu:6561: haṃho vāyasa rājahaṃsa śuka he he śārike kathyatāṃ VidSrk_22.19c *(718c)
GK22vidsriiu:6562: haṃho siṃhakiśoraka tyajasi cet kopaṃ vadāmas tadā VidSrk_33.42a *(1060a)
GK22vidsriiu:6564: hā kaṣṭaṃ ka iha kṣamaḥ pratikṛtau kasyaitad āvedyatāṃ VidSrk_28.7a
GK22vidsriiu:6565: hā kaṣṭaṃ kavicakramaulimaṇinā dakṣeṇa yan nekṣitaḥ VidSrk_50.30a *(1727a)
GK22vidsriiu:6566: hā kaṣṭaṃ timiratviṣo vayam api vyaktaṃ hatā ity amī VidSrk_30.11c *(967c)
GK22vidsriiu:6567: hā kaṣṭaṃ phalalolupair apasṛtaṃ śākhāmṛgaiś cañvalair VidSrk_33.6c
GK22vidsriiu:6568: hā kālaḥ kim ayaṃ kalir na hi na hi prāptaḥ sa gharmāgamaḥ VidSrk_9.1d
GK22vidsriiu:6569: hātavyāyam asaṃstavāya visaraḥ saṃsāra ityādikaṃ VidSrk_48.17c *(1610c)
GK22vidsriiu:6570: hā mātar madayanti hā kurabaka bhrātaḥ svasar mālati VidSrk_41.32b
GK22vidsriiu:6572: hāracchāyāṃ vahati kucayor antarāle mṛṇālī VidSrk_11.22a *(287a)
GK22vidsriiu:6583: hālāṃ mālūrakoṣair yuvatisahacarā barbarāḥ śīlayanti VidSrk_35.44d
GK22vidsriiu:6585: hāsyaśrīlavalāñchitā ca yad asāv asyāḥ kapolasthalī VidSrk_17.6c *(470c)
GK22vidsriiu:6587: hā hā tathāpi viṣayān na jahāti cetaḥ VidSrk_48.40d *(1633d)
GK22vidsriiu:6588: hinasti pratyaṅgaṃ jvara iva garīyān ita ito VidSrk_22.11c *(710c)
GK22vidsriiu:6590: himartur naidāghīm ahaha viṣamāṃ tāpanarujam VidSrk_23.16d *(767d)
GK22vidsriiu:6591: himavati divyauṣadhayaḥ krodhāviṣṭaḥ phaṇī śirasi VidSrk_23.40b *(791b)
GK22vidsriiu:6594: hiṃsrān vīkṣya puraḥ purāṇapuruṣaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dhyāsyasi VidSrk_6.41b
GK22vidsriiu:6595: hūtānaṅgam ulūlukākalaravaiḥ prīṇanti yūnāṃ manaḥ VidSrk_13.1d *(306d)
GK22vidsriiu:6596: hūṃkārāḥ kalapañcamapraṇayinas truṭyanti niryānti ca VidSrk_22.38d *(737d)
GK22vidsriiu:6598: hṛtpaṭṭake yad yad ahaṃ likhāmi tat tad vidhir lumpati sāvadhānaḥ
GK22vidsriiu:6599: hṛtvāpi vasusarvasvam amī te jaladāḥ sakhi VidSrk_33.67a *(1085a)
GK22vidsriiu:6601: hṛdayam aśaraṇaṃ me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kaṭākṣair VidSrk_17.18c *(482c)
GK22vidsriiu:6607: hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ VidSrk_18.3d *(537d)
GK22vidsriiu:6608: hṛdi svacchā vṛttir vijayibhujayor vīryam atulaṃ VidSrk_37.31c *(1243c)
GK22vidsriiu:6611: hetor vinopakārī yadi nāma śateṣu kaścid ekaḥ syāt VidSrk_38.48a *(1301a)
GK22vidsriiu:6612: hemante himaśītamārutabhayād āśliṣya dorbhyāṃ tanuṃ VidSrk_41.19c *(1399c)
GK22vidsriiu:6616: helābhis tava deva deva kīrtivanitā yasmāt samullaṅghati VidSrk_32.18d
GK22vidsriiu:6618: hradaṃ hastāghātair vidalasi kim utphullanalinam VidSrk_33.54b *(1072b)
GK22vidsriiu:6619: hriyā pārśvaṃ paśyan nibhṛtanibhṛtaṃ muñcati dhanuḥ VidSrk_41.28d *(1408d)
GK22vidsriiu:6620: hriyā sarvasyāsau harati viditāsmīti vadanaṃ VidSrk_49.28a *(1665a)
GK22vidsriiu:6622: hrīṇāś ca sasmitam ivāpasaranti dūram VidSrk_29.48d *(944d)
